options.content: The period over period analysis tabs will showcase cost for the selected date and time period _N_ , for N-1 period and calculate delta as a percentage.  For example if you today is Friday and you select "Last 2 Days" in the time period the widgets will display Friday and Thursday for the "Selcted Time Period".  Data for Wednesday and Tuesday for the "Prior Time Period" and calculate the percantage change between the two periods.  If you do not have data or tags as far bag as the prior time period, the widget will display a 0.

targets.rawSQL:
-- When troubleshooting a query, it helps to use the Query Inspector button and copy the query into Athena
-- To view resource names add in line_item_resource_id to the SELECT and GROUP BY statements
WITH CURRENT_PERIOD_COST AS (
SELECT
date_diff(
  '$CURGranularity', 
  $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date),  
  $__timeTo(line_item_usage_start_date)
) as HOURS,
SUM(line_item_unblended_cost) as period_one_cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date) 
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND line_item_operation = 'RunInstances'
  AND line_item_usage_type Like '%Usage%'
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
GROUP BY
1
LIMIT 1
)
  
SELECT
(SELECT period_one_cost FROM CURRENT_PERIOD_COST) as Cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
LIMIT 1

-- When troubleshooting a query, it helps to use the Query Inspector button and copy the query into Athena
-- To view resource names add in line_item_resource_id to the SELECT and GROUP BY statements

WITH CURRENT_PERIOD_COST AS (
SELECT
date_diff(
  'hour', 
  $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date),  
  $__timeTo(line_item_usage_start_date)
) as HOURS,
SUM(CASE
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage' THEN savings_plan_savings_plan_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'DiscountedUsage' THEN reservation_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'Usage' THEN line_item_unblended_cost
    ELSE 0 
  END) AS period_one_cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date) 
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND line_item_operation = 'RunInstances'
  AND line_item_usage_type Like '%Usage%'
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
GROUP BY
1
LIMIT 1
)
  
SELECT
  SUM(CASE
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage' THEN savings_plan_savings_plan_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'DiscountedUsage' THEN reservation_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'Usage' THEN line_item_unblended_cost
    ELSE 0 
  END) AS Cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
  line_item_usage_start_date >= $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date) - (SELECT HOURS FROM CURRENT_PERIOD_COST) * INTERVAL '1' HOUR
  AND line_item_usage_start_date <= $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date)
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND line_item_operation = 'RunInstances'
  AND line_item_usage_type Like '%Usage%'
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'

-- When troubleshooting a query, it helps to use the Query Inspector button and copy the query into Athena
-- To view resource names add in line_item_resource_id to the SELECT and GROUP BY statements
WITH CURRENT_PERIOD_COST AS (
SELECT
date_diff(
  'hour', 
  $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date),  
  $__timeTo(line_item_usage_start_date)
) as HOURS,
SUM(CASE
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage' THEN savings_plan_savings_plan_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'DiscountedUsage' THEN reservation_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'Usage' THEN line_item_unblended_cost
    ELSE 0 
  END) AS period_one_cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date) 
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND line_item_operation = 'RunInstances'
  AND line_item_usage_type Like '%Usage%'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
GROUP BY
1
LIMIT 1
)
  
SELECT
  ((SELECT period_one_cost FROM CURRENT_PERIOD_COST) - SUM(CASE
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage' THEN savings_plan_savings_plan_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'DiscountedUsage' THEN reservation_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'Usage' THEN line_item_unblended_cost
    ELSE 0 
  END)) / (SUM(CASE
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage' THEN savings_plan_savings_plan_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'DiscountedUsage' THEN reservation_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'Usage' THEN line_item_unblended_cost
    ELSE 0 
  END)) as Change
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
  line_item_usage_start_date >= $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date) - (SELECT HOURS FROM CURRENT_PERIOD_COST) * INTERVAL '1' HOUR
  AND line_item_usage_start_date <= $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date)
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND line_item_operation = 'RunInstances'
  AND line_item_usage_type Like '%Usage%'
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
LIMIT 1;

-- When troubleshooting a query, it helps to use the Query Inspector button and copy the query into Athena
-- To view resource names add in line_item_resource_id to the SELECT and GROUP BY statements
WITH CURRENT_PERIOD_COST AS (
SELECT
date_diff(
  '$CURGranularity', 
  $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date),  
  $__timeTo(line_item_usage_start_date)
) as HOURS,
SUM(line_item_unblended_cost) as period_one_cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date) 
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AWSELB'
  AND line_item_usage_type = 'LoadBalancerUsage' 
  AND line_item_operation LIKE '%LoadBalancing%'
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
GROUP BY
1
LIMIT 1
)
  
SELECT
  (SELECT period_one_cost FROM CURRENT_PERIOD_COST) as Cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
LIMIT 1

WITH CURRENT_PERIOD_COST AS (
SELECT
date_diff(
  'hour', 
  $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date),  
  $__timeTo(line_item_usage_start_date)
) as HOURS,
SUM(line_item_unblended_cost) as period_one_cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date) 
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AWSELB'
  AND line_item_usage_type = 'LoadBalancerUsage' 
  AND line_item_operation LIKE '%LoadBalancing%'
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
GROUP BY
1
LIMIT 1
)
  
SELECT
  SUM(line_item_unblended_cost) as Cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
  line_item_usage_start_date >= $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date) - (SELECT HOURS FROM CURRENT_PERIOD_COST) * INTERVAL '1' HOUR
  AND line_item_usage_start_date <= $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date)
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AWSELB'
  AND line_item_usage_type = 'LoadBalancerUsage' 
  AND line_item_operation LIKE '%LoadBalancing%'
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'

WITH CURRENT_PERIOD_COST AS (
SELECT
date_diff(
  'hour', 
  $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date),  
  $__timeTo(line_item_usage_start_date)
) as HOURS,
SUM(line_item_unblended_cost) as period_one_cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date) 
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AWSELB'
  AND line_item_usage_type = 'LoadBalancerUsage' 
  AND line_item_operation LIKE '%LoadBalancing%'
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
LIMIT 1
)
  
SELECT
  ((SELECT period_one_cost FROM CURRENT_PERIOD_COST) - SUM(line_item_unblended_cost)) / (SUM(line_item_unblended_cost)) as Change
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
  line_item_usage_start_date >= $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date) - (SELECT HOURS FROM CURRENT_PERIOD_COST) * INTERVAL '1' HOUR
  AND line_item_usage_start_date <= $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date)
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AWSELB'
  AND line_item_usage_type = 'LoadBalancerUsage' 
  AND line_item_operation LIKE '%LoadBalancing%'
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Load Balancer - Period over Period Analysis

targets.rawSQL:
-- When troubleshooting a query, it helps to use the Query Inspector button and copy the query into Athena
-- To view resource names add in line_item_resource_id to the SELECT and GROUP BY statements
WITH CURRENT_PERIOD_COST AS (
SELECT
date_diff(
  '$CURGranularity', 
  $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date),  
  $__timeTo(line_item_usage_start_date)
) as HOURS,
SUM(line_item_unblended_cost) as period_one_cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date) 
  AND (line_item_product_code = 'AWSELB' OR line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2')
  AND (line_item_usage_type LIKE '%-Bytes' OR line_item_usage_type = 'LCUUsage' OR line_item_usage_type = 'NLCUUsage')
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
GROUP BY
1
LIMIT 1
)
  
SELECT
  (SELECT period_one_cost FROM CURRENT_PERIOD_COST) as Cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
LIMIT 1

  $__timeTo(line_item_usage_start_date)
) as HOURS,
SUM(line_item_unblended_cost) as period_one_cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date) 
  AND (line_item_product_code = 'AWSELB' OR line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2')
  AND (line_item_usage_type LIKE '%-Bytes' OR line_item_usage_type = 'LCUUsage' OR line_item_usage_type = 'NLCUUsage')

  AND (line_item_product_code = 'AWSELB' OR line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2')

  AND (line_item_usage_type LIKE '%-Bytes' OR line_item_usage_type = 'LCUUsage' OR line_item_usage_type = 'NLCUUsage')

  ((SELECT period_one_cost FROM CURRENT_PERIOD_COST) - SUM(line_item_unblended_cost)) / (SUM(line_item_unblended_cost)) as Change

-- When troubleshooting a query, it helps to use the Query Inspector button and copy the query into Athena
-- To view resource names add in line_item_resource_id to the SELECT and GROUP BY statements

SELECT
date_diff(
  '$CURGranularity', 
  $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date),  
  $__timeTo(line_item_usage_start_date)

SUM(line_item_unblended_cost) as period_one_cost

WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date) 
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND line_item_usage_type LIKE 'NatGateway-Hours'
  AND line_item_operation = 'NatGateway'
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
GROUP BY
1
LIMIT 1

  (SELECT period_one_cost FROM CURRENT_PERIOD_COST) as Cost

LIMIT 1

WITH CURRENT_PERIOD_COST AS (
SELECT
date_diff(
  'hour', 
  $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date),  
  $__timeTo(line_item_usage_start_date)
) as HOURS,
SUM(line_item_unblended_cost) as period_one_cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date) 
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND line_item_usage_type LIKE 'NatGateway-Hours'
  AND line_item_operation = 'NatGateway'
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
GROUP BY
1
LIMIT 1
)
  
SELECT
  SUM(line_item_unblended_cost) as Cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
  line_item_usage_start_date >= $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date) - (SELECT HOURS FROM CURRENT_PERIOD_COST) * INTERVAL '1' HOUR
  AND line_item_usage_start_date <= $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date)
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND line_item_usage_type LIKE 'NatGateway-Hours'
  AND line_item_operation = 'NatGateway'
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'

WITH CURRENT_PERIOD_COST AS (
SELECT
date_diff(
  'hour', 
  $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date),  
  $__timeTo(line_item_usage_start_date)
) as HOURS,
SUM(line_item_unblended_cost) as period_one_cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date) 
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND line_item_usage_type LIKE 'NatGateway-Hours'
  AND line_item_operation = 'NatGateway'
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
LIMIT 1
)
  
SELECT
(SELECT period_one_cost FROM CURRENT_PERIOD_COST) / (SUM(line_item_unblended_cost)) - 1 as Change
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
line_item_usage_start_date >= $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date) - (SELECT HOURS FROM CURRENT_PERIOD_COST) * INTERVAL '1' HOUR
AND line_item_usage_start_date <= $__timeFrom(line_item_usage_start_date)
AND line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
AND line_item_usage_type LIKE 'NatGateway-Hours'
AND line_item_operation = 'NatGateway'
AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: NAT Gateway - Period over Period Analysis

panels.description:
EC2 Compute  Cost - Cost of compute for all instances in ASG (amortized).
Loadbalancer Cost - Cost for Load Balancer and LCUUsage.
Networking Cost - Cost for instance traffic, NAT Gateway Traffic and Load Balancer Traffic.
Natgateway Cost - Hourly Charge for NAT Gateway.

targets.rawSQL:
-- When troubleshooting a query, it helps to use the Query Inspector button and copy the query into Athena
-- To view resource names add in line_item_resource_id to the SELECT and GROUP BY statements
SELECT 
  date_trunc('$CURGranularity', line_item_usage_start_date) as date,
  SUM(CASE
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage' THEN savings_plan_savings_plan_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'DiscountedUsage' THEN reservation_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'Usage' THEN line_item_unblended_cost
    ELSE 0 
  END) AS amortized_cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date) 
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND line_item_operation = 'RunInstances'
  AND line_item_usage_type LIKE '%Box%'
  AND line_item_line_item_type in ('SavingsPlanCoveredUsage', 'Usage', 'DiscountedUsage')
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
GROUP BY 
  1

-- When troubleshooting a query, it helps to use the Query Inspector button and copy the query into Athena
-- To view resource names add in line_item_resource_id to the SELECT and GROUP BY statements
SELECT 
  date_trunc('$CURGranularity', line_item_usage_start_date),
  SUM(CASE
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage' THEN savings_plan_savings_plan_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'DiscountedUsage' THEN reservation_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'Usage' THEN line_item_unblended_cost
    ELSE 0 
  END) AS amortized_cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date) 
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AWSELB'
  AND line_item_usage_type = 'LoadBalancerUsage' 
  AND line_item_operation LIKE '%LoadBalancing%'
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
GROUP BY 
  1

-- When troubleshooting a query, it helps to use the Query Inspector button and copy the query into Athena
-- To view resource names add in line_item_resource_id to the SELECT and GROUP BY statements
SELECT 
date_trunc('$CURGranularity', line_item_usage_start_date) as date,
SUM(CASE
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage' THEN savings_plan_savings_plan_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'DiscountedUsage' THEN reservation_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'Usage' THEN line_item_unblended_cost
    ELSE 0 
  END) AS amortized_cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date) 
  AND (line_item_product_code = 'AWSELB' OR line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2')
  AND (line_item_usage_type LIKE '%-Bytes' OR line_item_usage_type = 'LCUUsage' OR line_item_usage_type = 'NLCUUsage')
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
GROUP BY 
  1

-- When troubleshooting a query, it helps to use the Query Inspector button and copy the query into Athena
-- To view resource names add in line_item_resource_id to the SELECT and GROUP BY statements
SELECT 
  date_trunc('$CURGranularity', line_item_usage_start_date),
  SUM(CASE
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage' THEN savings_plan_savings_plan_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'DiscountedUsage' THEN reservation_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'Usage' THEN line_item_unblended_cost
    ELSE 0 
  END) AS amortized_cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date) 
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND line_item_usage_type LIKE 'NatGateway-Hours'
  AND line_item_operation = 'NatGateway'
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
GROUP BY 
  1

panels.title: Service Cost Trends

targets.rawSQL:
-- When troubleshooting a query, it helps to use the Query Inspector button and copy the query into Athena
-- To view resource names add in line_item_resource_id to the SELECT and GROUP BY statements
SELECT 
  line_item_availability_zone,
  SUM(CASE
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage' THEN savings_plan_savings_plan_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'DiscountedUsage' THEN reservation_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'Usage' THEN line_item_unblended_cost
    ELSE 0 
  END) AS amortized_cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
$__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date)
AND line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
AND line_item_operation = 'RunInstances'
AND line_item_usage_type LIKE '%Box%'
AND line_item_line_item_type in  ('Usage', 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage', 'DiscountedUsage')
AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
GROUP BY 
1

panels.title: Compute Cost by AZ - Tag: $TagKey Value: $TagValue

targets.rawSQL:
-- When troubleshooting a query, it helps to use the Query Inspector button and copy the query into Athena
-- To view resource names add in line_item_resource_id to the SELECT and GROUP BY statements
SELECT 
  product_instance_type as instance_type,
  SUM(CASE
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage' THEN savings_plan_savings_plan_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'DiscountedUsage' THEN reservation_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'Usage' THEN line_item_unblended_cost
    ELSE 0 
  END) AS amortized_cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date)
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND line_item_operation = 'RunInstances'
  AND line_item_usage_type Like '%Box%'
  AND line_item_line_item_type in  ('Usage', 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage', 'DiscountedUsage')
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
GROUP BY 
1

panels.title: Compute Cost by Instance - Tag: $TagKey Value: $TagValue

targets.rawSQL:
-- When troubleshooting a query, it helps to use the Query Inspector button and copy the query into Athena 
SELECT
  date_trunc('$CURGranularity', line_item_usage_start_date),
  SUM(CASE
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage' THEN savings_plan_savings_plan_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'DiscountedUsage' THEN reservation_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'Usage' THEN line_item_unblended_cost
    ELSE 0 
  END) AS amortized_cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date)
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND line_item_operation = 'RunInstances'
  AND line_item_usage_type Like '%Box%'
  AND line_item_line_item_type in  ('Usage', 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage', 'DiscountedUsage')
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
GROUP BY 1

-- When troubleshooting a query, it helps to use the Query Inspector button and copy the query into Athena 
SELECT
  date_trunc('$CURGranularity', line_item_usage_start_date),
  SUM(CASE
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage' THEN savings_plan_savings_plan_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'DiscountedUsage' THEN reservation_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'Usage' THEN line_item_unblended_cost
    ELSE 0 
  END) AS amortized_cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date)
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND line_item_operation = 'RunInstances'
  AND line_item_usage_type Like '%Box%'
  AND line_item_line_item_type in  ('Usage', 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage', 'DiscountedUsage')
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: Status failure Metrics for the entire ASG. This metric reports whether the instance has passed both the instance status check and the system status check in the last minute. This metric can be either 0 (passed) or 1 (failed). By default, this metric is available at a 1-minute frequency at no charge.

targets.rawSQL:
-- When troubleshooting a query, it helps to use the Query Inspector button and copy the query into Athena
-- To view resource names add in line_item_resource_id to the SELECT and GROUP BY statements
SELECT
  date_trunc('$CURGranularity', line_item_usage_start_date),
  SUM(CASE
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage' THEN savings_plan_savings_plan_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'DiscountedUsage' THEN reservation_effective_cost
    WHEN line_item_line_item_type = 'Usage' THEN line_item_unblended_cost
    ELSE 0 
  END) AS amortized_cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date)
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND line_item_operation = 'RunInstances'
  AND line_item_usage_type Like '%Box%'
  AND line_item_line_item_type in  ('Usage', 'SavingsPlanCoveredUsage', 'DiscountedUsage')
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'

panels.title: Instance Status Check Failed - ASG: $ASGName

panels.description: The number of earned CPU credits (T instances) that an instance(s) have accrued since they were launched or started for the named Auto Scaling Group. Credits are accrued in the credit balance after they are earned, and removed from the credit balance when they are spent. The credit balance has a maximum limit, determined by the instance size.

targets.rawSQL:
-- When troubleshooting a query, it helps to use the Query Inspector button and copy the query into Athena
-- To view resource names add in line_item_resource_id to the SELECT and GROUP BY statements
SELECT 
  date_trunc('$CURGranularity', line_item_usage_start_date),
  SUM(line_item_unblended_cost) as unblended_cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date)
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND line_item_usage_type LIKE '%AWS%Bytes%'
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'

1
HAVING SUM(line_item_unblended_cost) > 0

panels.description: Load Balancer LCU Usage for $LBName - Be sure to update the Load Balancer Name variable at the top of the dashboard.

targets.rawSQL:
-- When troubleshooting a query, it helps to use the Query Inspector button and copy the query into Athena
-- To view resource names add in line_item_resource_id to the SELECT and GROUP BY statements
SELECT
date_trunc('$CURGranularity', line_item_usage_start_date),
SUM(line_item_unblended_cost) as cost
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date) 
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AWSELB'
  AND (line_item_usage_type LIKE '%LCUUsage' OR line_item_usage_type LIKE '%NLCUUsage')
  AND line_item_operation LIKE '%LoadBalancing%'
  AND line_item_resource_id LIKE CONCAT('%', '$LBName')
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
  GROUP BY
  1
  HAVING SUM(line_item_unblended_cost) > 0

panels.description: Compute resources with tag_key: $TagKey and tag_value: $TagValue observed in the past 30 days.  The last_observed column will list the timestamp when the resource was last seen in the CUR file.

targets.rawSQL:
-- When troubleshooting a query, it helps to use the Query Inspector button and copy the query into Athena 
SELECT
  line_item_resource_id as instance_id,
  product_instance_type as instance_type,
  product['vcpu'] as vcpu,
  MAX(line_item_usage_start_date) AS last_observed
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE
  -- $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date)
  line_item_product_code = 'AmazonEC2'
  AND line_item_operation = 'RunInstances'
  AND line_item_usage_type Like '%Box%'
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}'
  AND line_item_usage_start_date <= CURRENT_DATE
  AND line_item_usage_start_date >= DATE_ADD('day', -30, CURRENT_DATE)
GROUP BY 1,2,3
ORDER BY 4 DESC

panels.title: Compute Resources (EC2)

list.description: Athena CUR Table connection for queries to AWS Cost and Usage
list.label: CUR Datasource
list.name: CURDatasource

list.description: CloudWatch Datasource, for queries to metrics and logs
list.label: CloudWatch Datasource
list.name: CWDatasource

list.description: CUR Database; change this name if you have modified the installation procedures
list.label: CUR Database
list.name: CURDatabase

list.description: CUR Table name; change if your table for CUR 2 data is not named cur2
list.label: CUR Table
list.name: CURTable

list.description: All account IDs found in the CUR for the time period selected.
list.label: Account ID
list.name: AccountId

list.description: Regions observed in the CUR over the look back period
list.label: Region
list.name: Region

query.rawSQL:
SELECT 
DISTINCT product_region_code,
CASE 
    WHEN product_region_code = 'us-east-1' THEN 0
    ELSE 1
END AS sort_order
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
$__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date)
AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
AND product_region_code != ''
ORDER BY
sort_order,
product_region_code

list.description: Input the name of your autoscaling group.
list.label: ASG Name
list.name: ASGName

list.description: Load balancers observed in the CUR for the account/region during the selected time period.
list.label: Load Balancer
list.name: LBName

query.rawSQL:
SELECT 
  DISTINCT(line_item_resource_id)
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date) 
  AND line_item_product_code = 'AWSELB'
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] = '${TagValue}';

list.description: Select the Granularity for CUR data points
list.label: CUR Granularity
list.name: CURGranularity

list.description: Select the Granularity for CloudWatch data points in seconds.
list.label: CloudWatch Granularity(s)
list.name: CWGranularity

list.description: Tag Key extracted from CUR and observed in the time period selected.
list.label: Tag Key
list.name: TagKey

query.rawSQL:
WITH all_keys AS (
  SELECT ARRAY_DISTINCT(ARRAY_AGG(key)) AS unique_keys
  FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
  CROSS JOIN UNNEST(MAP_KEYS(resource_tags)) AS t(key)
  WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date)
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
)

SELECT key AS unique_key
FROM all_keys
CROSS JOIN UNNEST(unique_keys) AS t(key);

SELECT 
  resource_tags['${TagKey}'] AS tag_value,
  COUNT(*) AS count
FROM ${CURDatabase}.${CURTable}
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(line_item_usage_start_date)
  AND line_item_usage_account_id = '${AccountId}'
  AND product_region_code = '${Region}'
  AND resource_tags['${TagKey}'] IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY resource_tags['${TagKey}']
ORDER BY count DESC;
